params.deadline: Block timestamp by which solution must be submitted
params.problemCommitment: Poseidon hash of the problem (n_spins, edges)
params.threshold: Energy threshold T - solution must achieve E  T

returns.jobId: The ID of the newly created job

params.spinCommitment: Poseidon commitment to the spin configuration

cancelJob(uint256).notice: Cancel an open job (only poster, before deadline)

expireJob(uint256).notice: Mark expired jobs and refund poster

postJob(bytes32,int64,uint256).notice: Post a new Ising optimization job

submitProof(uint256,bytes32,int64,bytes).notice: Submit a solution proof for an open job
